Fix tests which compare against the environment (#28)

* Directly use the System environment Map to set the expected.

Removes use of EnvironmentConfiguration to set the expected result as
this may interpolate values with substitution.

* Disable interpolation when testing against the system environment.

The runtime environment is not entirely controlled by the test and so
may contain values that are subject to interpolation by the
configuration. Disabling this allows the configuration to be tested
directly against the environment properties.

* Added spotbugs version to reports section.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1841034 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-712] Added a refresh() method to reloading detector.

FileHandlerReloadingDetector had the problem that the first invocation
of the isReloadingRequired() method the file's last-modified date was
initialized. So a changed file could only be recognized on a 2nd
invocation.

Now the class offers a dedicated method to initialize the
last-modified date from the underlying file.
DefaultReloadingDetectorFactory was changed to call this method after
the detector has been created. So reloading checks are active from the
very beginning.

Thanks to Rolland Hobbie for the patch.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831807 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CONFIGURATION-701: Added addConfigurationFirst() method.

child configurations to a CompositeConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831806 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Typo: 'JavaDoc' -> 'Javadoc'.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831648 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CONFIGURATION-687: Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831360 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CONFIGURATION-687: Creation of child builders is now lazy.

Creating the child configuration builders of a combined configuration
first breaks interpolation during evaluation of the definition
configuration. Therefore, the builders are now created when the
combined configuration is accessed for the first time, immediately
before their managed configuration is accessed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831359 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CONFIGURATION-687: Changes on reloading of combined configurations.

The reloading controller of a ReloadingCombinedConfigurationBuilder is
now created only once on first access. When triggering a reloading
check it is important that all child configuration sources are
included.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1831358 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CONFIGURATION-687: Removed duplicate builders.

The builders for the child configurations of a combined configuration
are no longer created each time the managed configuration is created;
rather, they are created once initially. This resolves the memory leak
that the list of child builders grows more and more.

processed.

List properties defined as single string with a delimiter character
now retain their format when the configuration is saved.

Note that the implemented solution is not perfect, it cannot handle
all possible constellations. For instance, for lists defined in a
mixed form (multiple XML elements each of wich defines multiple
list values) cannot be handled and are reformatted on saving.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1775740 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-646] Changed handling of loads in layout.

PropertiesConfigurationLayout used to remove its event listener
registration when a load operation starts and add it again
afterwards. This caused problems with the auto-save mechanism
because update events were processed by the layout after the listener
for auto-save was triggered, resulting in incomplete configuration
files.

Now the listener is not removed, but temporarily disabled.

[CONFIGURATION-626] get() now supports array conversions.

The method now checks whether the target class of the conversion is

conventions and requirements.

This method copies a dedicated subset of properties from a source

[CONFIGURATION-619] Extended CombinedBuilderParametersImpl.

A new flag was introduced which controls the inheritance of builder
settings to child configurations. If this flag is true (which is the
default value), parameter objects for child configuration builders
are initialized with some of the settings of the parent builder.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1690812 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-604] Changed construction of hierarchical configuration.

The conversion of a flat configuration to a hierarchical one now uses copy()
rather than append(). This causes a slightly different structure of the
resulting configuration. Because append() adds new nodes on each invocation
the property keys "x.y.z" and "x.y" processed in this order generates two y
child nodes of x. With copy() only a single node is created. This is closer to
the original structure of the flat configuration and is less dependent on the
order of configuration keys.

Fixed null checks reported by findbugs.

Some methods were partly checking for null references, but de facto assuming
that parameters are not null. The checks were removed, and the documentation
now states that these parameters must not be null.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674562 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a findbugs warning.

Don't swallow an exception; at least log it.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674561 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix for findbugs warning "RV_RETURN_VALUE_IGNORED_BAD_PRACTICE".

The return value of File.mkdirs() should not be ignored. We now throw an
explicit exception. This also simplifies diagnostics when such an error
occurs.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674560 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

non-serializable fields.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674554 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674553 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed Findbugs warning "OBL_UNSATISFIED_OBLIGATION".

The result set may not be closed. Now the official method for opening a result
is used which stores the result set in an internal field and ensures that it
gets closed later.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1674552 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed some warnings.

Findbugs warnings about unnecessary instance creations; now auto-boxing is
used instead; var-args methods could be called in a more natural way; removed
two unused fields.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1672933 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1672932 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Findbugs error "IS2_INCONSISTENT_SYNC" in CombinedConfigurationBuilder.

Added synchronized keyword to getChildBuilders() method. The remaining
unsynchronized access to the sourceData field is caused by the
initResultInstance() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1672931 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Findbugs error IS2_INCONSISTENT_SYNC in some builder classes.

This is caused by the initResultInstance() method not being synchronized. This
method is only called by the base builder class in a synchronized block.
Documentation was added that synchronization is needed when invoking this
method from a sub class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1672930 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Addressed findbugs "DM_DEFAULT_ENCODING" in FileHandler.

Added documentation that the platform's default encoding is used if no encoding
is explicitly set. Then the warning can be addressed as this is documented
behavior.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1672929 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed general priority filters. Added an exclusion for bug pattern

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1614983 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed calls to getRootNode() in AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration.

Using this method in this way can lead to subtile race conditions. A node model
may replace its root node at any time. Therefore, it should only be accessed
via the model's node handler. This is always in sync with the root node and
allows thread-safe access.

BasicConfigurationBuilder now removes event listeners when the result is reset.

The now obsolete configuration object should no longer generate events, even
if it is still referenced and accessed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612686 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed BUILDER_OPTIONAL literal from EventSourceSupport.

As ConfigurationBuilder extends EventSource and now all listeners are
registered via the event source methods, all configuration builders provide a
valid EventSource implementation. Thus, the code in
BuilderConfigurationWrapperFactory could be simplified.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612685 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed some problems with the handling of events from managed builders.

MultiFileConfigurationBuilder was only handling events of type RESET. Now all
builder event types are supported and are propagated to event listeners
registered at the builder.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612684 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a protected method for firing builder events.

This allows derived builder classes to fire their own or adapted events.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612683 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed failing test cases.

MultiFileConfigurationBuilder now keeps a separate list of the event listeners
which have to be passed to managed builders. It is filled with event listeners
not related to builder events.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612682 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added an isInstanceOf() method to EventType.

This method can be used to check whether there is an instanceof relation
between two given event types.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612681 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved fetchSuperEventTypes() method to EventType.

It makes sense to have this useful utility method at a central place. The new
version has the advantage that it is null-safe.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612680 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Deprecated methods for handling configuration listeners.

The goal is that BasicConfigurationBuilder only provides the methods from the
EventSource interface for handling event listeners. This makes the API more
stringent and reduces confusion. Because of the filtering by event types it is
no problem to add listeners to managed configurations which they do not
support.

Currently some tests are failing and have been @Ignored.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612679 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Prevented TestXMLPropertiesConfiguration to access the internet.

A test case used to load a configuration file which references a DTD. This
caused an internet access. Now an entity resolver is set to avoid this.

Now all sources for events in Commons Configuration can be accessed in a

BuilderConfigurationWrapperFactory had to be slightly modified again.

BasicConfigurationBuilder now support the EventListenerProvider interface.

If a parameters object passed to the configure() method implements this
interface, the listeners it contains are added to the configuration builder.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612664 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new EventListenerParameters class.

This is an implementation of the EventListenerProvider interface providing a
convenient API to define the event listeners of a configuration builder.
Instances of this class can be passed to a builder's configure() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612662 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added EventListenerProvider interface.

This is a special parameters interface for initializing a configuration
builder with information about event listener registrations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612661 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Simplified BuilderConfigurationWrapperFactory.

Because the methods in configuration builders now have the same return values
as the corresponding event source methods, no conversion of return values is
necessary.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1612660 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed return type of add/removeConfigurationListener().

The methods no longer support method chaining (this is difficult to implement
over the hierarchy of builders anyway). Instead, they use the same return
values as the methods from EventSource.

Sub classes need to invoke these methods during construction time - and a
constructor should not invoke non-final methods. Also, it really makes
sense to have these methods final as the default implementation should be
sufficient and not changed by derived classes.

accessed.

The builder class now has an EventListenerList as member. This instance manages

Changed methods for registering event listeners for configuration builders.

The methods now use the generic event listener interface. (This commit breaks
the build as there are unresolved compilation failures.)

Added a new ConfigurationBuilderEvent class.

This is the new base class for all events related to configuration builders.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1596018 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new EventListenerList class.

This is a utility class for managing event listeners. An event listener
registration consists of a listener and an event type. Events can be fired,
and the listeners registered for this type (or super types) are automatically
invoked. Listener regstrations are type-safe.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1596017 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added EventListener interface.

This is a generic interface for reacting on all kinds of events generated by
the [configuration] library.

Added bounds for type parameter in EventType.

The generic type must at least be an Event.

Added a new base class for all events generated by this library.

This class already defines some properties common to all derived events.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1596013 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial implementation of EventType.

An EventType instance represents a specific type of an event generated by the
[configuration] library. It also stores a super event type, allowing events to
form a hierarchical structure.

[CONFIGURATION-567] XMLBeanDeclaration now escapes node names.

When nested properties are processed the name of a child node used to be
directly passed to configurationAt(). This can fail if the node name contains
characters with a special meaning for the expression engine. Now node names
are escaped using the current expression engine.

registrations are removed for all child configurations.

The method can now return an arbitrary object which is used as value when

This is necessary to correctly populate a CLEAR_TREE event for hierarchical
configurations. InMemoryNodeModel here returns a list with QueryResult objects

TrackedNodeModel now requires an InMemoryNodeModelSupport object.

Access to the underlying model is now indirect. This caused some adaptations in
multiple hierarchical configuration classes. Because access to the model is
now guarded by the Synchronizer the remaining failing test for
CombinedConfiguration is running now.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1587026 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added InMemoryNodeModelSupport.

This is a special extension of NodeModelSupport for models of type
InMemoryNodeModel. It is needed by special model implementations (mainly
TrackedNodeModel) which have to access an InMemoryNodeModel object.

The new method was implemented in AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration. Access to
the NodeModel is guarded by the configuration's Synchronizer.

Added NodeModelSupport interface.

This interface allows access to a NodeModel. It will be implemented by
hierarchical configurations. Having this separate interface allows for better
modularization. Components only interested in a NodeModel need not bother
with a full-blown hierarchical configuration.

Changed a test with sub configurations to expose a problem with updating a
combined configuration: When accessing the model of a combined configuration
that has been invalidated it is not always reconstructed.

This is a node visitor implementation which scans a hierarchy of nodes for a

It has to be ensured that the synchronizer is called before the sub

initialized.

It is necessary to invoke beginRead() on the configuration to be copied.

XMLConfiguration now calls the new mergeRoot() method.

Fixed all remaining failing test cases.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585194 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a new mergeRoot() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

Such a merge operation is required by concrete configuration implementations
when a new configuration source has been loaded whose data now has to be
added to the already existing content.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585193 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

ImmutableNode now allows setting multiple attributes at once.

A method was added which expects a map with attributes to be set. This is
required for more complex update operations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585192 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

ImmutableNode now supports changing the name.

A setName() method was added which creates a new node instance with the
passed in name.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585191 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed problems in InMemoryNodeModel.

Transactions for clearing properties caused corrupt data if the keys to be
removed did not point to existing properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585190 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed some failing test cases.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585188 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed handling of public and system IDs.

The IDs are now correctly obtained from the source XML document and passed to
the transformer before the target document is written.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585187 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a problem with handling of the xml:space attribute.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585186 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked XMLConfiguration to operate on immutable nodes.

The major part of the functionality for loading and saving XML documents is
working, but there is still a bunch of tests failing.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585185 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now supports reference objects that can be assigned to nodes.

This is required for some concrete configuration implementations which needs to
store additional data for their nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585184 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ReferenceTracker class.

This class manages reference objects that have been assigned to the nodes of a
model. The references are kept up-to-date, even if nodes in the model are
replaced during update operations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585183 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added mock support for resolve add key operations.

The method for preparing a resolver mock to support add keys was moved from
TestInMemoryNodeModelTrackedNodes to NodeStructureHelper. It is useful for
other tests, too.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585182 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ReferenceNodeHandler interface.

This interface allows access to reference objects which can be associated with
the nodes stored in a NodeModel.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585181 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added XMLDocumentHelper class.

This class will be used by XMLConfiguration to store a loaded XML document.
It also provides functionality for copying documents which is needed by
thread-safe save operations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585179 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed some problems introduced in the latest merge operation.

Some versions had been overridden and had to be restored.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1585178 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Merged changes from trunk into branch.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581069 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Merged changes from trunk to branch.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581056 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed some compilation failures.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581047 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix some compilation failures.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581045 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked HierarchicalConfigurationXMLReader to be compatible with immutable nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581044 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added the method getModel() to HierarchicalConfiguration interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1581042 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a failing test case.

The semantics of detached sub configurations has slightly changed. Therefore,
the test needs to be adapted: By calling close() the tracked node gets freed,
and a new section sub configuration can be created which is again connected to
its parent.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580609 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

getSection() now returns a SubnodeConfiguration.

Added some tests which ensure that the sub configurations are actually
connected to their parent.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580608 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a close() method to SubnodeConfiguration.

This method delegates to the close() method of the underlying TrackedNodeModel.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580607 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a close() method to TrackedNodeModel.

This method releases the tracked node used as root for the model. It allows
freeing resources explicitly if they are no longer needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580606 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Completed NodeHandler implementation for the global section.

The handler now filters all child nodes of the root node which are section
nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580605 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial implementation of the method for getting the global section.

A specialized node handler is used to ensure that only nodes which are not
section nodes are visible.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580604 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a problem with list delimiter handling in hierarchical configurations.

AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration must override addPropertyInternal() rather
than addPropertyDirect() to guarantee correct list delimiter handling.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580603 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added NodeHandlerDecorator class.

This base class provides basic functionality for adapting a NodeHandler to
special requirements.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580602 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

TestTreeData now extends the new abstract node handler test base class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580601 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Created an abstract base class for node handler tests.

This class can be used for testing different NodeHandler implementations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580600 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed argument type of NodeStructureHelper.nodeForKey().

The method can accept a more general NodeHandler<ImmutableNode>; this interface
also has a method for querying the root node.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580599 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Started rework of INIConfiguration to be compatible with immutable nodes.

Loading the configuration now creates a hierarchy of immutable nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580597 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Some cleanup of methods related to sub configurations.

Removed unused methods. Made a method protected which is needed by sub classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580596 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added trackChildNodeWithCreation() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

This method allows tracking a child node of a selected node. If the child does
not exist, it is created dynamically.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580594 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented childConfigurationsAt(String, boolean) in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580045 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented configurationsAt(String, boolean) in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580044 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new configurationsAt() methods to HierarchicalConfiguration interface.

The new methods now allow specifying the supportUpdates flag.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580043 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added trackChildNodes() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

This method allows tracking of all children of a selected node. It will be used
for the new implementation of childConfigurationsAt().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580042 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added selectAndTrackNodes() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

This method is needed for the new implementation of configurationsAt(). It
allows tracking multiple nodes selected by a key at once.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580041 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unused fields.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580040 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented nodeKey() in AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580039 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented resolveNodeKey() in AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration.

Some refactoring to remove duplicated code.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580038 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed compilation failures and failing test cases.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580037 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new methods to NodeKeyResolver interface.

These methods are needed for doing more complex operations with tracked nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1580036 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Catch exceptions when reevaluate the keys of tracked nodes.

It is possible that the evaluation of a key causes an exception to be thrown,
e.g. if the expression engine has changed in the meantime. In this case, the
node becomes detached.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578589 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked update and event handling for sub configurations.

The complicated mechanism to detect updates in sub configurations, propagate
them, and validate root nodes is no longer needed. This is all handled by
tracked nodes. Now a simple change listener is registered at connected sub
configurations which sends events of type EVENT_SUBNODE_CHANGED.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578588 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented sub configuration creation hooks in SubnodeConfiguration.

The configurationAt() methods now work correctly in SubnodeConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578587 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed constructor of SubnodeConfiguration.

The NodeSelector argument was redundant and could be removed. Also removed the
unnecessary createSubnodeConfiguration() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578586 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added hooks for the creation of a sub configuration.

There are new protected methods for defining a sub configuration's parent model
and its NodeSelector.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578585 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented childConfigurationsAt() in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578584 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented configurationsAt() in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578583 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented configurationAt() in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

The method now either creates a BaseHierarchicalConfiguration initialized with
the selected root node or a SubnodeConfiguration with a corresponding
NodeSelector. Adapted test classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578582 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed the HierarchicalConfiguration interface regarding sub configurations.

The configurationAt() methods no longer return SubnodeConfiguration objects.
Rather, the type was made more general to HierarchicalConfiguration<T>.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578581 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Started rework of SubnodeConfiguration.

The class now uses a TrackedNodeModel to connect itself to a node in the
parent's model. Note that this changes the semantics of sub configurations:
This class is now always aware of changes in the model of its parent
configuration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578580 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added functionality to NodeStructureHelper to create flexible table trees.

It is now possible to create the tree structure with database tables and their
fields in a flexible manner.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578578 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added TrackedNodeModel class.

This is a special NodeModel implementation which operates on a tracked node.
It will be used for the new implementation of sub node configurations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578576 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed clear() method in NodeModel interface.

A parameter of type NodeKeyResolver was added. This is needed by some concrete
implementations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578575 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a replaceTrackedNode() method to InMemoryNodeModel.

This method is useful when working on sub trees of the model. It is then
possible to detach a whole sub tree and to replace its root node.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578574 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method for querying a node handler for a tracked node to InMemoryNodeModel.

This functionality is needed for operating on sub trees of the model.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added TrackedNodeHandler class.

This is a special NodeHandler implementation for tracked nodes that are still
active.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578571 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Extracted a base class for ImmutableNode node handlers.

A special implementation will be required for tracked nodes. Thereforem common
functionality has been extracted into a new base class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1578570 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented special treatment for transactions which detach their root node.

Per default, a tracked node that becomes detached is not changed; this means
that the last instance of this tracked node is used. However, if the node was
the root of the transaction which caused it to become detached, this behavior
is not desired. Rather, it can be assumed that the transaction cleared this
node or the sub tree it belongs to. Therefore, in this scenario the node is
replaced by a new empty node instance.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575770 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now supports setProperty() on a tracked node.

The implementation is analogous to other operations on tracked nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575769 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now supports addNodes() on a tracked node.

The implementation is analogous to other operations on tracked nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575768 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now supports addProperty() on a tracked node.

The implementation is analogous to other operations on tracked nodes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575767 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now supports clearTree() on a tracked node.

The implementation is analogous to clearProperty().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575766 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryModel now supports clearProperty() on a tracked node.

When executing update operations on tracked nodes it has to be distinguished
whether the node is detached or not. For Non-detached nodes the update
operation can be performed on the model's current node structure. Detached
nodes live in an independent node structure. This is implemented by storing
them in a separate node model.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575764 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

NodeModel no longer defines the getRootNode() method.

The root node now has to be obtained from the NodeHandler. This is necessary at
least for implementations like InMemoryNodeModel which use immutable structures
that can be replaced by new instances. A NodeHandler is a kind of snapshot of
such a structure at a certain point in time. If the root node is obtained in a
different method call, it may no longer be compatible with the snapshot used by
the node handler.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575763 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added method getRootNode() to NodeHandler interface.

A node handler is always associated with a specific nodes structure. If the
handler and the root node are queried from different objects, there is a
potential race condition that the nodes structure has been updated in the mean
time.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575762 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Renamed TreeData.getRoot() to getRootNode().

This is in sync with other classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575761 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel no longer implements the NodeHandler interface.

This caused a number of adaptations in other classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575760 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

TreeData now implements the NodeHandler interface.

The current solution that InMemoryNodeModel implements NodeHandler is
problematic because of the implementation of the getParent() method: there can
be race conditions if the model was updated and now uses a different TreeData
instance. Therefore, all this functionality has to be kept in a single place:
in TreeData.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575759 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved InMemoryNodeModel.TreeData to a top-level class.

It will be enhanced, so it deserves its own source file.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575758 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

NodeTracker now has the notion of detached nodes.

Tracked nodes can become detached after changes of the underlying nodes
structure if their NodeSelector does no longer select a single node.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575757 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

InMemoryNodeModel now provides support for tracking nodes.

Nodes can be tracked by specifying a corresponding NodeSelector. After updates
of the model, the node instances associated with this key are still available.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575756 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a helper class for tracking nodes.

This class allows access to nodes by key even if the nodes structure was
changed by update operations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575755 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved some functionality related to mock resolvers to NodeStructureHelper.

Working with mock resolvers can be useful for multiple test classes. Therefore,
it makes sense to have this functionality at a central location.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575754 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added NodeSelector class.

This class allows selecting a specific node based on a single key or a chain
of keys.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1575753 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented the copy constructor in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

The corresponding tests are now successful.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1573349 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BaseHierarchicalConfiguration now supports cloning correctly.

cloneNodeModel() was implemented to create a copy of the node model using the
same node as root node.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1573347 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented subset() in BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

The corresponding tests now pass.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1573346 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BaseHierarchicalConfiguration now extends AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration.

Removed all code inherited from the base class. Also, the unit test was
stripped down to test only specific functionality. The tests fail currently,
however, at least the code compiles.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1573345 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

AbstractHierarchicalConfiguration now implements the modified HierarchicalConfiguration interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/branches/immutableNodes@1573343 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed HierarchicalConfiguration interface to deal with arbitrary nodes.

The interface now has a generic parameter for the type of nodes an
implementation deals with.

Enforce a maximum size for the replacement mapping.

If the replacement mapping becomes too large after the execution of a
transaction, it is reset, and the parent mapping is reconstructed. This is a
performance optimization which aims to ensure that the access to parent nodes
does not become too complex.
