git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1555842 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-486] Removed static defaultExpressionEngine field.

Using static fields this way is thread-hostile. Hierarchical configurations now
use the default expression engine instance if not specified otherwise. The new
defaults mechanism defined by CONFIGURATION-559 makes it possible to define
another default expression engine globally.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1555841 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-563] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1555840 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-563] DefaultExpressionEngine is now immutable.

An instance is initialized with a DefaultExpressionEngineSymbols object. The
set methods for changing symbols have been removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1555839 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-563] Added a new DefaultExpressionEngineSymbols class.

This is an immutable class which just holds the special symbols used by a
DefaultExpressionEngine object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1555834 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Used correct class in logger declaration.

This also fixes a cyclic dependency between the top-level and the io package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554641 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-562] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554640 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-562] Changed API of ExprLookup.

The class no longer supports setting an AbstractConfiguration object. Instead,
a ConfigurationInterpolator and a logger can be set. This change also removes a
cyclic dependency between the interpol and the top-level package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554639 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Javadoc changes.

Removed imports to classes from top-level package which were just referenced by
{@link} tags.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554638 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved ValueTransformer to convert package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554637 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved ConversionException to new exception package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554636 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved ConfigurationException and ConfigurationRuntimeException to new exception package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554634 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a new package for exception classes.

Currently, exception classes defined by this library are located in the
top-level package. If sub packages throw exceptions of these types, this may
cause cyclic dependencies. To avoid this, all exceptions classes are moved into
a separate package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1554633 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CopyObjectDefaultHandler now uses BeanHelper for copying properties.

This method handles parameters object with a fluent API correctly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553028 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BeanHelper now provides a method for copying properties.

This method uses the internal PropertiesUtilsBean instance, so that enhanced
introspection is enabled. This is needed to deal with parameters objects
which have a fluent API.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553027 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

MultiWrapDynaBean now uses BeanHelper for creating WrapDynaBeans.

This ensures that the enhanced introspection is used on the wrapped beans. So
parameters objects with a fluent API can be processed correctly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553026 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BeanHelper now provides a method for creating a WrapDynaBean.

For this purpose the managed BeanUtilsBean instance is needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553025 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The tests for property access on builder parameters now use BeanHelper.

Due to the specially configured BeanUtilsBean instance managed by BeanHelper,
it is able to set properties on objects which do not fully comply to the Java
Beans specification.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553024 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BeanHelper now manages a BeanUtilsBean instance initialized in a special way.

This instance uses an additional BeanIntrospector with support for fluent
interfaces as used by the concrete builder parameters implementations. The
methods accessing bean properties are now delegating to this BeanUtilsBean
instance.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553023 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed all specific BeanInfo classes for builder parameters.

With BeanUtils 1.9 and appropriately configured BeanIntrospection, these
classes should not be needed any more.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553022 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated dependency to most recent version of BeanUtils.

Configuration needs the new feature of custom bean introspectors that have
been made available with the 1.9.0 release.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1553021 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1546649 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed addChildParameters() method from CombinedBuilderProperties.

This method is no longer needed as the initialization mechanism has been
replaced by another one based on default parameters handlers.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1546646 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CombinedConfigurationBuilder now uses default handlers for initializing child sources.

The parameters objects for child configuration sources are now initialized
using the DefaultParametersManager obtained from the builder's configuration.
This replaces the previous mechanism based on example parameters objects.
(The new approach is more flexible and in-line with the global defaults
initialization mechanism.)

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1546644 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CombinedBuilderProperties now supports DefaultParametersHandler objects.

The intension is to use the same mechanism for specifying default values for
child configuration sources as is used for normal parameter objects.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1546643 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added CopyObjectDefaultHandler class.

This is a DefaultParametersHandler implementation that copies the properties of
a given object onto the object to be initialized.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1546642 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Parameters now uses a DefaultParametersManager.

The handling of default values for newly created parameters objects is now
delegated to a DefaultParametersManager instance which can either be passed to
the constructor or is dynamically created.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545825 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Extracted functionality related to default values to a separate class.

The new class DefaultParametersManager is now responsible for managing and
applying DefaultParametersHandler objects.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545824 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved DefaultParametersHandler from fluent to builder package.

This interface makes more sense in the builder package. Also, it is going to be
used there, and we do not want to create cyclic dependencies with the fluent
package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545823 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545074 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Parameters now supports the registration of DefaultParametersHandlers.

The parameters objects created by an instance are now directly initialized with
default values provided by the registered handlers.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545073 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Parameters objects now implement multiple interfaces.

The proxy objects created by Parameters now not only implement one single
parameters interface but also all logic base interfaces. This can be used to
apply certain logic based on their inheritance structure.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545072 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made Parameters a bean class.

The class will have state in future. Therefore, it can no longer provide its
services as a static utilities class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545071 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added DefaultParametersHandler interface.

Objects implementing this interface can be registered at the Parameters class
to initialize newly created parameters object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1545070 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Add latest release.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1544779 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Follow the Apache Project Branding Requirements from https://www.apache.org/foundation/marks/pmcs.html#graphics

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1535372 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

ASF Branding

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1534197 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-555] Fixed a problem with the handling of the xml:space attribute.

The attribute was only evaluated for sub elements, but not for the current
element. However, now there is a corner case of an element which only
contains sub elements and has the attribute set to "preserve". In this case,
a trim is done because it does not make sense to assign a value consisting
only of whitespace to this element.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527396 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527363 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527360 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

DefaultFileSystem now uses the logger defined by the base class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527249 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Some changes in FileSystem class.

Removed the static default file system field. It was thread-hostile. (The
file system now has to be provided explicitly by clients.) Changed the way the
logger is accessed, do not call a non-final, non-private method in
constructor. Member fields have been made volatile, they might be accessed by
different threads.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527248 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed default file system, made protected fields private.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527247 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed some obsolete methods from ConfigurationUtils.

Methods related to URL handling have been moved to FileLocatorUtils.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527246 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed file system access in tests for CombinedConfigurationBuilder.

Rather than changing the default file system, the file system is now set via
the parameters object passed to the builder.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527244 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed access to default file system in test case.

In future, the file system will have to be set explicitly if another one than
the DefaultFileSystem is to be used. Adapted the test class correspondingly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527243 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Extended properties for file-based builders by FileLocationStrategy property.

The FileLocationStrategy to be used for resolving the file to be loaded can now
be specified in the builder's parameters object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527242 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated the user's guide regarding file access.

The section about file systems was renamed to "Access to Files". It now also
covers information about file location strategies.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527241 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a test case for configuration of the file system.

This test demonstrates that for each configuration source defined in the
definition file for a CombinedConfigurationBuilder a FileSystem can be defined.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527240 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete method and reduced method visibility.

The old, hard-coded locate() method is no longer used; it has been fully
replaced by the new one which uses the customizable location strategy.
The method obtainFileSystem() is only used within the io package, so its
visibility could be reduced.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527239 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

FileBasedConfigurationBuilder now ensures that its FileLocator is fully defined.

Before actually loading the associated file, the locator's locate() method is
called. This ensures that all properties of the FileLocator pointing to the
file are initialized. This is important when saving the file: a fully
initialized FileLocator ensures that the correct output file is written.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527238 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CatalogResolver now uses the locator-based method for locating files.

References to FileLocatorUtils.locate(FileSystem, String, String) have been
replaced by FileLocatorUtils.locate(FileLocator). This makes use of the
customizable location strategy.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527237 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed loading of include files in PropertiesConfiguration.

Files to be included are now resolved using the new locate(FileLocator) method
of FileLocatorUtils (and thus the customizable FileLocationStrategy is
applied).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527236 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed test case for a locate() operation with an undefined TCCL.

The test now uses the new locate() method which operates on a FileLocator.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527233 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Use a simpler way to obtain a URL in a test case.

The old FileLocatorUtils.locate() method has become obsolete, so all references
to it have to be removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527232 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

FileHandler now uses the locator-based locate() method when loading its file.

This means that the customizable FileLocationStrategy is applied; applications
can change the algorithm for searching for configuration files.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527231 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

fullyInitializedLocator() now uses the new locate(FileLocator) method.

So when obtaining a fully initialized FileLocator the customizable
FileLocationStrategy is used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527230 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new locate() methods based on FileLocator objects.

These methods use a FileLocationStrategy to resolve the passed in locator
objects. They are going to replace the existing locate() variant based on a
base path and file name. This allows hooking into the search algorithm by
providing a custom FileLocationStrategy.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527229 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added support for a location strategy to FileHandler.

FileHandler now provides methods for setting and querying the
FileLocationStrategy of the underlying FileLocator.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527228 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method for extracting a location strategy from a FileLocator.

In a FileLocator the default location strategy can be overridden. The new
method always returns a valid strategy, no matter whether the locator
defines one or not.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527227 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a constant for the default file location strategy to FileLocatorUtils.

This strategy will be used if no specific strategy is provided in a
FileLocator. The default location strategy is a combined strategy which
simulates the algortihm used in Commons Configuration 1.x.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527226 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a property for the FileLocationStrategy to FileLocator.

The locator now supports defining the strategy how to resolve the referenced
file.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1527225 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525405 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added CombinedLocationStrategy class.

This class allows the creation of a custom FileLocationStrategy based on other
"primitive" strategies. Arbitrary combinations can be created to adapt the
location algorithm to very specific requirements.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525402 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ClasspathLocationStrategy.

This FileLocationStrategy implementation interprets a locator's file name as
resource name and tries to locate it on the classpath.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525401 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added HomeDirectoryLocationStrategy.

This FileLocationStrategy implementation searches for files in a configurable
home directory.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525400 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added BasePathLocationStrategy.

This FileLocationStrategy implementation tries to construct a path name from
the specified base path and file name.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525399 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added AbsoluteNameLocationStrategy.

This FileLocationStrategy implementation checks whether the provided file name
is an absolute file name and whether this file exists.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525398 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added methods for file to URL conversions to FileLocatorUtils.

When locating files it is often necessary to convert a File object to a URL.
The new methods simplify this task by already handling exceptions and returning
null in this case. This is the result returned by location strategies if a file
could not be resolved.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525397 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added FileSystemLocationStrategy class.

This is a specialized FileLocationStrategy which delegates to the FileSystem
in order to resolve the file in question.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525396 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ProvidedURLLocationStrategy.

This is a simple FileLocationStrategy implementation which checks whether the
passed in FileLocator already has a URL set. In this case, the file can be
accessed directly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525395 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added FileLocationStrategy interface.

This interface will be used for making the process of resolving files
customizable.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1525394 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524823 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Deleted FileLocator interface and renamed FileLocatorImpl to FileLocator.

There is no need for an interface. An immutable FileLocator class is
sufficient.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524822 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved FileLocatorImpl to a top-level class.

We are going to use this class directly later on.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524821 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a locate() method to FileHandler.

This method ensures that the referenced file is once located (if possible).
Then a locate() operation does not have to be performed every time the file is
accessed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524820 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method for checking whether a locator is fully initialized.

Because the way a file is referenced by a FileLocator can make a difference
when the file is actually accessed it makes sense to have a method which checks
this. This helps client code to decide whether fullyInitializedLocator()
needs to be called. FileHandler also needs this information to provide
functionality to initialize its FileLocator on demand.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524819 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method to FileLocatorUtils for obtaining a fully initialized FileLocator.

There are different ways to specify the file to be loaded depending on the
initialized fields of a FileLocator. If a file can be successfully located
based on this information, it makes sense to populate all the corresponding
member fields in a consistent way to point to this file.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked the storage of the file location in FileHandler.

The data is now stored in an immutable FileLocator object. Changing the
location means that a new FileLocator instance is created which replaces the
old one. This approach does not require any synchronization. Atomic references
are used, so all calls are non-blocking.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523798 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method for checking whether a FileLocator points to a file.

This is certainly a useful information. It is also required by FileHandler's
load() and save() methods to verify that sufficient information is available.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523797 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added support for a default file system.

FileLocatorUtils now defines a constant pointing to the default file system
instance. There is a method which checks whether a file system is set. If not,
the default file system is returned. This mechanism is going to replace the
static default file system field used by the FileSystem class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523796 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added an implementation class for FileLocator.

FileLocatorUtils offers a new method for creating FileLocator objects using a
fluent interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523795 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a helper method for testing equals() to ConfigurationAssert.

The already existing assertEquals() method was renamed because there was a
name clash with static imports.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523794 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Switched to most recent versions of junit and EasyMock.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523793 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a missing @Rule annotation.

It is a bit strange that this test succeeded in the past. With jUnit 4.11 an
exception is thrown.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523792 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed getInputStream(String, String) method from FileSystem.

This method is no longer called by any component.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1522005 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CatalogResolver no longer uses FileSystem.getInputStream(String, String).

Instead, in a first step a URL is retrieved via FileLocatorUtils.locate(). Then
from the URL an input stream is opened. After this change, FileSystem's
getInputStream(String, String) method is no longer used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1522004 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed further methods from ConfigurationUtils.

Callers now use the corresponding methods in FileLocatorUtils.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1521604 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved all FileSystem-related classes to io package.

Functionality used from ConfigurationUtils was switched to be called from
FileLocatorUtils. Some methods which now caused compilation errors in
ConfigurationUtils (because FileUtils was moved, too) have been deleted (they
are replaced by corresponding methods in FileLocatorUtils).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1521603 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new FileLocatorUtils helper class.

This internal helper class provides functionality for locating configuration
files based on different search criteria. Initially, some methods of
ConfigurationUtils have been copied over. The next step is to remove these
methods from ConfigurationUtils and to point calling code to the new class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1521600 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete FileSystemBased interface.

The interface was mainly used by classes derived from
AbstractFileConfiguration which no longer exists.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1521599 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520803 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated changes.xml for [CONFIGURATION-554].

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520802 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Configuration builders now use the configured BeanHelper instance.

BasicConfigurationBuilder's fetchBeanHelper() was rewritten to obtain a
BeanHelper object from configuration parameters. If one is found, it is used.
Otherwise, the default BeanHelper instance is used. Configuration builders use
the BeanHelper for creating their result configurations. Some builders also
create additional objects dynamically.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520801 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BasicBuilderParameters now supports setting a BeanHelper instance.

The BeanHelper is used by the ConfigurationBuilder for the creation and
initialization of the result configuration. By making use of this new
property a specific BeanHelper can be injected.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520800 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated user's guide related to changes on BeanHelper.

Since BeanHelper is no longer a static utility class, its usage patterns have
changed. This has to be reflected in the examples and descriptions provided by
the user's guide.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed throws declarations for runtime exceptions.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520797 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved methods dealing with constructor arguments.

Since BeanHelper is no longer a static utility class, the
findMatchingConstructor() method does not really belong here. It was moved to
DefaultBeanFactory and made protected. Here it can be used by custom
BeanFactory implementations extending this class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520796 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BeanHelper now provides a shared default instance.

This instance can be used by an application if no special configuration is
needed. All references to BeanHelper's static methods (which occurred
exclusively in builder classes) were changed to use this default instance.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520795 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made BeanHelper a bean class.

Instances can now be created and configured in isolation.
BeanHelper provides a straight-forward implementation of BeanCreationContext
for interacting with the used BeanFactory.
Note that this commit breaks the build because there are still a bunch of
references to BeanHelper's static methods.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520793 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BeanFactory now expects a BeanCreationContext as parameter.

All information required by the createBean() method is now contained in a
BeanCreationContext object. This change of the interface caused some
adaptations on the DefaultBeanFactory and BeanHelper classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520792 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new BeanCreationContext interface.

This interface encapsulates all information needed for the creation of a bean.
In addition, it provides a mechanism for the creation of nested beans (e.g.
constructor arguments or nested properties) which is not tight to
BeanHelper. This is required for changing the way BeanHelper is used in
future.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1520791 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517191 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete resolveContainerStore() method.

This method is now replaced by the functionality of the ConversionHandler to
deal with complex objects like collections or arrays. It lies in the
responsibility of this handler to extract the value to be converted to a
single object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517190 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a property for the conversion handler to BasicBuilderProperties.

It is now possible to specify the ConversionHandler of a configuration when a
builder is used to create the configuration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517189 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Extended the user's guide.

Added sections describing the basic data type conversion facilities and how
they can be customized. The section about list delimiter handling was
reworked, too.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517187 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved ListDelimiterHandler to convert package.

When moving the implementation classes to the convert package the interface was
simply forgotten.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1517186 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete method and made PropertyConverter package protected.

The PropertyConverter class is now only accessed by DefaultConversionHandler.
For other components, there is no need to call low-level conversion methods
directly.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516583 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed references to PropertyConverter.

These references mainly occurred in JavaDocs. They were outdated anyway (all
conversions are now done by the conversion handler which does not necessarily
call PropertyConverter).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516582 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made configuration field private and final.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516581 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked DataConfiguration to use the generic get() methods.

All special data conversion methods are now based on the generic methods
provided by AbstractConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516580 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The get() methods now handle the throwExceptionOnMissing flag correctly.

Previously, the methods did not throw an exception if the key could not be
resolved and the flag was set.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516579 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a special handling for empty elements.

When converting to a list or to an array it makes sense to handle empty
elements in a configuration in a special way - rather than returning a
collection with a single empty element, an empty collection should be
returned. This is now implemented by DefaultConversionHandler. A new method was
added which determines whether an element is empty. So this can be customized
by subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516578 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed handling of return values for getList() and getCollection().

If the passed in key cannot be resolved and the default value is null, the
methods now return null rather than an empty collection. This is the
behavior which was used by DataConfiguration in version 1.x, and it makes
sense to return the default value directly if no data is found.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516577 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed direct dependency to PropertyConverter.

Data type conversions are now performed by a ConversionHandler object. The
ConversionHandler instance to be used can be passed to the constructor of
DefaultBeanFactory. Alternatively, a default instance is used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516575 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a problem with conversions to primitive data types.

In this case, the Class.cast() method cannot be used.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516574 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a constant for a default instance to DefaultConversionHandler.

It is safe to share an instance of this class between multiple components.
Therefore, a default instance can be defined and used anywhere.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a to() method to PropertyConverter expecting a DefaultConversionHandler.

This variant of the method obtains meta information required for the conversion
(e.g. the date format) from the conversion handler object rather than using an
Object array. The to() method operating on an Object array is going to be
removed after all calling references have been adapted.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516572 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a property for the date format to DefaultConversionHandler.

This format string specified here will be used for conversions to Date or
Calendar objects.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516571 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Improved Javadocs of the getList() methods.

The Javadoc of the original getList() method was misleading; it did not mention
that the result list could contain complex object. This was corrected. It was
also tried to describe the differences between the different getList() methods.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516570 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The standard get() methods are now implemented based on the generic method.

By making use of the generic get() conversion method the code size could be
reduced.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515449 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented getStringArray() in terms of the generic getArray() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515448 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a missing toString conversion.

The to() method of PropertyConverter was lacking a trivial conversion to a
string. This feature is now available based to the toString() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515447 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Implemented the new generic get methods in AbstractConfiguration.

AbstractConfiguration now has a property of type ConversionHandler. The
implementations of the new methods delegate to this converion handler object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515446 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added some generic get methods to the ImmutableConfiguration interface.

This is related to [CONFIGURATION-508]. These methods are a generic form of
specialized data type conversion methods. Added corresponding (non functional)
dummy implementations to AbstractConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515445 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed the interpolate() method from PropertyConverter.

In future PropertyConverter will be package protected and deal only with type
conversions.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515444 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Inlined the interpolate() helper method from PropertyConverter.

This was the only place this method was used. The plan is to remove
interpolate() from PropertyConverter, so that this class can focus only on
conversions.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515443 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved tests related to interpolation.

The tests affected test basic interpolation functionality. Therefore, they were
moved from TestPropertyConverter to TestAbstractConfigurationBasicFeatures.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515442 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512801 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial implementation of DefaultConversionHandler.

This class implements the conversion methods defined by the ConversionHandler
interface. It delegates to PropertyConverter which does the actual type
conversions. There are some protected methods which can be overridden by sub
classes in order to customize the conversion mechanism.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a flatten() method which allows limiting the number of results.

This method is needed for the conversion of collections or arrays to single
values. Here only the first element needs to be extracted. It is more
efficient to abort the extraction process early instead of producing the full
result collection.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512798 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved PropertyConverter to convert package.

It will in future exclusively be used by classes in this package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512797 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved ListDelimiterHandler classes to convert package.

The topic of list delimiter handling is related to data type conversion.
Also, some functionality for detecting containers (arrays, collections, ...)
can be reused for some conversions.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512796 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ConversionHandler interface.

This interface defines the basic facade of the data type conversion component.
An object implementing this interface is associated with each configuration
object. Requests for type conversions are delegated to this object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512795 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Created new convert package.

This package will contain the code responsible for data type conversions.
The ConversionException class was moved into the new package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1512794 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed check for @author tags from checkstyle configuration.

@author tags are discouraged, so at least the check for their presence should
be removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1511080 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete Lock class.

After the redesign of synchronization and concurrent access this class is no
longer needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1511079 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed obsolete Reloadable interface.

After the redesign of the reloading mechanism this interface is no longer
needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1511078 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed special treatment of Reloadable objects from ConfigurationUtils.

The Reloadable interface is no longer implemented by any Configuration class.
It is no longer needed after the reloading mechanism was rewritten.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1511077 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a test case which was failing under Linux.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1505202 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Switched to most recent version of Commons Parent.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1505193 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-418] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502873 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed old properties for list delimiter parsing from AbstractConfiguration.

Affected are the properties listDelimiter and delimiterParsingDisabled. Also
the static defaultListDelimiter property was removed. The handling of list
delimiter characters is now solely in the responsibility of the list delimter
handler object associated with the configuration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502872 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to isDelimiterParsingDisabled().

Now only the list delimiter handler is responsible for splitting lists.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502871 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed a check whether delimiter parsing is disabled.

This check was done to determine the value of the forceSingleLine flag. The
code for writing properties now uses the list delimiter handler for escaping
lists. If this is not supported, the property is written on multiple lines.
Also replaced an unnecessary call to setListDelimiter() in a test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502870 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

XMLPropertiesConfiguration now uses the list delimiter handler to escape property values.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502869 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked the handling of the reserved include property.

The ListDelimiterHandler is now used to split the string into multiple values.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502868 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked the handling of list properties in ConfigurationConverter.getProperties().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502867 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Adapted Javadocs related to list splitting.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502866 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Correctly initialized result configurations with the list delimiter handler.

Initialization of old list delimiter properties is no longer needed. Instead
the list delimiter handler from the result configuration has to be set for
the additional configuration. Test cases were adapted.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502865 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setDelimiterParsingDisabled() in test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502864 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setDelimiterParsingDisabled() in test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502863 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary access to old list delimiter properties in test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502862 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setDelimiterParsingDisabled() in test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502861 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setDelimiterParsingDisabled() in test case.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502860 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed references to old list splitting properties from test class.

Added an improved test for list handling with a specific list delimiter
character.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502859 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed references to old list splitting properties form XMLConfiguration.

The Javadocs related to list splitting were adapted. In the test class,
unnecessary calls to disable delimiter parsing were removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502858 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Javadocs update related to list delimiter handling.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502857 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

SubsetConfiguration now shares its list delimiter handler with its parent.

The overridden properties for the list delimiter and the delimiter parsing
disabled flag have been removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502856 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed list delimiter handling in SubnodeConfiguration.

Now the listDelimiterHandler property is used rather than listDelimiter, and
listDelimiterParsingDisabled.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502854 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Javadocs update related to list delimiter handling.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502853 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Javadocs update related to list delimiter handling.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502852 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setListDelimiter().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502851 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

DynamicCombinedConfiguration no longer uses the properties for the list delimiter and for disabling list delimiter parsing.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502850 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Simplified ConfigurationUtils.convertToHierarchical().

There is no longer the need to disable list delimiter handling temporarily
because it is disabled for new configurations per default.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502849 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

CompositeConfiguration no longer supports the properties for the list delimiter character and for disabling list delimiter parsing.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502848 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed unnecessary call to setListDelimiter() in test method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502846 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BasicBuilderParameters now supports the new listDelimiterHandler property.

The properties for the list delimiter character and for disabling list
delimiter parsing were removed. This caused a bunch of changes in several test
classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502845 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-550] PropertyConverter now supports conversion to Character.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502844 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed a bunch of methods from PropertyConverter.

These methods have been moved into specific implementations of the
ListDelimiterHandlder interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502843 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Changed the splitting of Locale components.

Now we use a plain regular expression split rather than the more complex
split() method of PropertyConverter.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502842 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with DatabaseConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502841 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a constant for a default instance of DisabledListDelimiterHandler.

An instance of DisabledListDelimiterHandler can be shared between arbitrary
configuration objects. So it is safe to use this instance whenever such an
object is needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502840 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

Splitting of property values in setProperty() is now done by calling the
ListDelimiterHandler rather than calling static methods of
PropertyConverter.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502839 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with MapConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502838 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with INIConfiguration.

There was a bug that list delimiter characters in property values were not
correctly escaped when saving an INIConfiguration. For this problem test
cases were added to verify that it is fixed after this change.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502837 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with web configurations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1502836 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500484 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with XMLConfiguration.

Rather than calling static methods of PropertyConverter, the
ListDelimiterHandler is now used to escape and to split property values.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500482 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

PropertiesConfiguration now uses its ListDelimiterHandler when saving its data.

The original code for saving properties file was moved into
LegacyListDelimiterHandler. The new code just delegates to the list delimiter
handler for the correct escaping of properties. Note that it was necessary to
slightly adapt the IOFactory interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500481 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Integrated ListDelimiterHandler with AbstractConfiguration.

The delimiter handler is now used to split properties that are added to the
configuration. Because per default list splitting is now disabled a number of
test cases had to be adapted.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500480 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added DefaultListDelimiterHandler class.

This is the list delimiter handler implementation to be used by new
applications that want to make use of the list splitting feature. It
implements a consistent algorithm for dealing with list delmiter and
backslash (escaping) characters.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500479 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added LegacyListDelimiterHandler class.

This is an implementation of ListDelimiterHandler which simulates the behavior
of PropertiesConfiguration in version 1.x. It is intended to be used by
applications that have to deal with configuration files created by the
old version.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500478 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The methods for escaping values of ListDelimiterHandler now expects a ValueTransformer.

When escaping single values, AbstractListDelimiterHandler already invokes the
transformer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500477 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ValueTransformer interface.

As becomes obvious, collaboration between a Configuration and a
ListDelimiterHandler can be complex when the configuration performs an
additional encoding of values before they are written to disk. This interface
allows the delimiter handler to perform this encoding on behalf of the
configuration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500476 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added DisabledListDelimiterHandler class.

This is a special implementation of ListDelimiterHandler which does not
support any list splitting. Thus it simulates the mode which was achieved in
the passed by setting the delimiterParsingDisabled property to true.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500475 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added an abstract base class for ListDelimiterHandler implementations.

This class already provides basic functionality for extracting primitive
values from an object (e.g. a collection or an array).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500473 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new ListDelimiterHandler interface.

This interface is part of an approach to solve the escaping issues with list
delimiters, escaped delimiters, and backslashs.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1500472 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-544] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497560 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-544] Updated dependencies in ant build.

Some missing dependencies were added, the dependency to Commons Lang 2.6 was
removed. Thanks to Oliver Kopp for the patch these modifications were based
on.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497559 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-462] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497530 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-462] Updated dependency from Lang 2.6 to 3.1.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497529 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

ConfigurationException now directly inherits from Exception.

NestableException from Commons Lang is no longer supported.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497527 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

ConfigurationRuntimeException now directly extends RuntimeException.

NestableRuntimeException of Commons Lang is no longer supported.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1497526 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1492410 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-546] BeanHelper can now deal with properties of type Collection if the passed in BeanDeclaration is populated correctly.

There is no framework support so far for creating such BeanDeclarations, but
if they are created manually by client code, they are processed successfully
by BeanHelper. Thanks to Justin Couch for the patch.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1492404 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Missing svn properties.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1489581 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1489156 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed another race condition with DynamicCombinedConfiguration.

Now all child configurations share a single Synchronizer with the parent
configuration. This ensures proper synchronization.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1489155 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed getReadLock() method.

This method was part of the old reloading implementation. Reloading has been
completely redesigned, therefore this method is no longer needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1489154 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed HierarchicalReloadableConfiguration class.

Reloading is now handled differently, therefore this base class is no longer
needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1489152 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updates to the user's guide related to thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488583 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a test case for concurrent access to CombinedConfiguration without a Synchronizer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488582 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a test case for concurrent access to SubnodeConfigurations without a Synchronizer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488581 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BaseHierarchicalConfiguration now implements the Initializable interface.

In initialize() internal data structures for managing SubnodeConfigurations are
initialized. So this initialization does not have to be performed lazily,
which makes concurrent access to SubnodeConfigurations possible without
having to use a fully functional Synchronizer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488580 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

BasicConfigurationBuilder now supports the Initializable interface.

If a newly created result instance implements this interface, the initialize()
method is called after other initializations are done.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488579 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added Initializable interface.

This interface is used by configuration builder implementations to find out
whether a configuration instance needs special initialization.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488578 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Ensure that the root node of the newly created CombinedConfiguration is initialized when it is returned from the builder.

This changes makes it possible to use read-only combined configurations
with a NoOpSynchronizer because no further initialization is needed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488577 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a dead lock problem with DynamicCombinedConfiguration.

There was a problem with read operations when a new child configuration had to
be created. This requires a write lock which caused the thread to hang. The
new solution determines the current configuration at the very begin of an
operation.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488576 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Adapted beginRead() and beginWrite() methods in CombinedConfiguration.

The readLock() and writeLock() methods were removed. They could cause
problems because they obtained locks without using the standard means. This
could break subclasses that rely on symmetric invocations of beginRead()/
endRead() and beginWrite()/endWrite() respective.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488575 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added an optimize flag to the beginRead() and beginWrite() methods.

This allows derived classes that override these methods to perform special
optimization. This is needed for instance for CombinedConfiguration; this
class has methods which need synchronized access, but do not require the
full combined configuration to be constructed. The alternative would be
to call the Synchronizer directly, but this is a source of trouble as it
circumvents the standard mechanisms for obtaining and releasing locks.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed a problem with BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.clone() related to SubnodeConfiguration management.

It must be ensured that the cloned configuration creates its own data
structures for managing SubnodeConfigurations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488572 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a chapter about thread-safety to the user's guide.

This is an initial version which may need some updates later.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488571 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked DynamicCombinedConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The class now uses its Synchronizer to protect its internal state against
concurrent access. All tests could be enabled again (after configuring a
fully functional Synchronizer).

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1488570 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fixed missing svn properties svn:eol-style and svn:keywords.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1486351 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reenabled a test case that was failing before.

The test method now sets a proper Synchronizer before accessing the test
configuration concurrently.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485394 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added support for setting a Synchronizer to BasicBuilderParameters.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485393 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked CombinedConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The Synchronizer object is now exclusively used to protect an instance against
concurrent access. This is a change of behavior because previously there was
always some kind of synchronization; now this is configurable. Therefore,
currently some tests for multi-threaded access are failing and have been
disabled.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485392 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Ensure proper synchronization of BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.subset() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485390 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Don't call non-private, non-final methods from the constructor.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485389 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Removed some stuff related to the old reloading mechanism.

CombinedConfiguration used to support a flag for triggering reloads on child
configurations. If set, on each property access all child configurations are
queried to initiate a reload if necessary. Reloading is now handled in a
different way; therefore, this mechanism could be removed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1485387 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked CompositeConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

The methods for accessing the list of child configurations and the in-memory
configuration now call the Synchronizer correctly. Updated Javadoc regarding
thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1483061 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Updated Javadocs related to thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1483060 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked PropertiesConfiguration regarding thread-safety.

Some special methods of PropertiesConfiguration now call the Synchronizer
correctly. Removed synchronization from properties set via the builder.
Updated Javadoc regarding thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1483059 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Some special methods of XMLConfiguration now call the Synchronizer correctly.
Updated Javadoc regarding thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482087 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

FileHandler now takes care for synchronization.

If the associated FileBased object implements the SynchronizerSupport
interface, the object is locked during load and save operations.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482086 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Use internal methods when loading and saving a PropertiesConfiguration instance.

This avoids that for each property to be loaded or saved the configuration's
synchronizer is invoked.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482085 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made SynchronizerTestImpl public, so that it can be used for test classes in other packages, too.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482084 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

The special methods of INIConfiguration now use the configuration's Synchronizer.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482083 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added ReadWriteSynchronizer class.

This is an implementation of the Synchronizer interfaced based on the
java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock. It can be used to make
configurations thread-safe if they are accessed concurrently.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482082 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Simplified handling of temporary files in test class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1482081 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Reworked SubnodeConfiguration to use a Synchronizer.

A SubnodeConfiguration per default shares its Synchronizer with its parent
because both configurations operate on the same node set. In the past
SubnodeConfiguration instances created with a subnode key (for detecting
structural changes of its parent) checked their root nodes on each read
access. Now such checks are performed when the parent configuration is
changed.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481154 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

In the copy constructor of BaseHierarchicalConfiguration the passed in configuration is now locked.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481153 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Do not call non-private, non-final method from constructor.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481152 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Configuration interface now extends SynchronizerSupport.

Implementations of the interface methods are provided by AbstractConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481151 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added new SynchronizerSupport interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481150 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Moved Synchronizer and related classes into a separate package.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481149 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Improved Javadocs related to thread-safety.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1481148 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added synchronization to update methods of BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

Some methods have been made final to prevent subclasses from breaking
synchronization. Corresponding protected methods with the suffix 'Internal'
were added.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479381 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a method for cloning Synchronizers to ConfigurationUtils.

This functionality is needed by implementations of clone() for
Configuration classes.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479380 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added synchronization to read methods of BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.

Some methods have been made final to prevent subclasses from breaking
synchronization. Corresponding protected methods with the suffix 'Internal'
were added.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479379 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made SynchronizerTestImpl helper class a top-level class.

It can now be used by other test classes, too.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479378 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Extracted invocations of the configuration's synchronizer into own methods.

This gives subclasses the opportunity to perform additional actions before or
after read/write operations - as long as they know what they do.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479377 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added final containsKey() method in AbstractConfiguration.

A protected abstract containsKeyInternal() was added, too, which has to be
defined by concrete subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479374 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added final isEmpty() method in AbstractConfiguration.

A new protected abstract isEmptyInternal() method was added, too, which has
to be defined in subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479373 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made getKeys() methods final in AbstractConfiguration.

New protected methods getKeysInternal() were added that can be overridded in
subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479372 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added a final getProperty() method to AbstractConfiguration.

This method is responsible for synchronization handling. There is now a new
protected getPropertyInternal() method which has to be defined by concrete
subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479371 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made setProperty() final.

There is now a new protected method setPropertyInternal() which can be
overriden by subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479370 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made clearProperty() method final.

Subclasses now can only override clearPropertyDirect().

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479369 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made addProperty() final.

There is now a new addPropertyInternal() method which can be overridden by
subclasses.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479368 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Made method clear() final in AbstractConfiguration.

There is now a new protected clearDirect() method which performs the actual
work. This is done to prevent subclasses from breaking basic functionality
like event handling or synchronization.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479367 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Initial integration of Synchronizer into AbstractConfiguration.

This is not yet complete. Currently, methods of AbstractConfiguration calling
the Synchronizer can be overridden by subclasses. This breaks proper
synchronization.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479366 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added NoOpSynchronizer, a trivial implementation of Synchronizer.

This Synchronizer implementation is used per default. Configurations using
this Synchronizer are not thread-safe.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479365 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Added Synchronizer interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479364 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Javadocs. Removed unnecessary (and wrong) @see tags.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1479353 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Increased waiting time for a reload operation as an attempt to fix a failing test case.
There was also a spelling mistake in the name of the test method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1467655 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-540] MapConfiguration now uses a passed in Properties object
directly as its data store rather than copying it.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1467644 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-524] Updated changes.xml.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1467449 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-524] CompositeConfiguration.clone() now ensures that the
configuration's interpolator is cloned, too.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1467448 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[CONFIGURATION-524] Added support for cloning a ConfigurationInterpolator.

If a configuration is cloned, its interpolator has to be cloned, too, because
it typically contains a Lookup pointing to the original configuration.
AbstractConfiguration now provides default functionality for this purpose
which can be called by clone() implementations in derived classes.
BaseConfiguration already calls this method.

Note that in the current state some constructors do not work any more.
They will be removed in a later stage. This caused many tests to be
adapted.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@561233 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

TLP related blanket changes:

s:jakarta.apache.org/commons:commons.apache.org:
s/commons-user@jakarta.apache.org/user@commons.apache.org/
s/commons-dev@jakarta.apache.org/dev@commons.apache.org/
s/Jakarta Commons/Apache Commons/
s:svn.apache.org/viewcvs/jakarta/commons:svn.apache.org/viewvc/commons:
s:svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/jakarta/commons:svn.apache.org/viewvc/commons:
s:svn.apache.org/viewvc/jakarta/commons:svn.apache.org/viewvc/commons:
s:svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons:svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons:

I'd appreciate another pair of eyes on this. There are some categories we probably don't want to change ATM (hopefully, none of these snuck in):
 * Historicals (proposals etc.)
 * URLs that shouldn't change (DOCTYPE fragments etc.)
 * Test cases where namespace URLs matter etc. (I'll track any related nightly failures)

Modify maven build to add two non-standard attributes to the jar's manifest file to indicate the values of "maven.compile.source" and "maven.compile.target". Also modify the build to include an "Implementation-Vendor-Id" of "org.apache" in the jar's manifest.

The two non-standard entires created in the manifest file will look something like the following:

X-Compile-Source-JDK: 1.3
X-Compile-Target-JDK: 1.3

This change serves two purposes:

  1) To provide comfort to users regarding JVM compatibility.
  2) Enable releases to be checked more easily for JVM compatibility.

The manifest specification indicates that "unknown" entries in the manifest file are ignored. These entries have been prefixed with "X-" which is a sometimes used "convention" for indicating non-standard entries.

See thread: http://tinyurl.com/839zh

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/jakarta/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@141946 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

- Went ahead and added the proposted "throwExceptionOnMissing"
  property to AbstractConfiguration.

- Changed the default behaviour back (!) to return null values unless
  this property has been set to true. This actually hits only three
  methods: getString() (which is the bad one), getBigInteger() and
  getBigDecimal(). The latter two could even be exempted from this
  property, leaving only getString(). But e.g. Turbine relies on
  this returning null for missing values.

  The internal implementation is

  foo = getString(key, null);
  if (foo == null) throw NoSuchElementException(...

  so that using a decorator for this would really be possible because
  you can't configure null as a valid return value. Might need more
  discussion.

- Reworked all the Unit tests to explicitly set the throwExceptionOnMissing
  property. Where tests behave differently, added additional test classes.

TODO: like commons-logging, commons-configuration could read a properties
file from the classpath (commons-configuration.properties) with the default
settings of the throwExceptionOnMissing flag.
